general.title: {emotes.support} Thank you for having me here!
general.description:
{emotes.arrow} Cool server! Can I stay here?

{emotes.arrow} My prefix for message commands is {prefix}
{emotes.arrow} I also offer slash commands, provided I have the necessary rights to do so

{emotes.arrow} To stay up to date, I recommend you join my [support discord]({support}).

{emotes.arrow} Have fun with {client}!
